## how to use Q_Q plot,and its function
```{r}
y <- rt(200,df=5)
y1 <- rnorm(200,1)
y2 <-rnorm(2000,1)
qqnorm(y,main="rt(200,df=55)")

qqnorm(y1,main = "rnorm(200,1)")
qqnorm(y2,main="rnorm(2000,1)")


```
